member.name: M:DemoBoard.ctlTabControl.TabControl_MouseUp(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: MousUp event is forwarded to frmMainForm to Raise an ForwardedMousUp event to ALL ctlTabControls

member.name: M:DemoBoard.ctlTabControl.gParentForm_ForwardedMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.Panel,System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: A MouseUp event is only detected by the control with the previous MouseDown. To solve this, The control with the previous MouseDown fires a MouseUp event. The frmMainForm catches this event and raises a ForwardedMouseUp to all ctlTabControls. Each ctlTabControl checks to see if this event was intended for him.

member.name: M:DemoBoard.ctlTabControl.gParentForm_ForwardedMousePanelLeave(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: A MouseUp event is only detected by to control with the previous MouseDown. To solve this, The control with the previous MouseDown fires a MouseLeave event when the MousePointer leaves the rectangle of the gDockingCrossTabControl. Each ctlTabControl checks to see if this event was intended for him.

member.name: P:DemoBoard.ctlMoveListRow.Perceptable
member.summary: Perceptable replaces Visible. Because Visible is set to False when Form is hidden. To determine what was originally Visible is difficult
